content.rendered:
My first attempt at blogging was a huge fail, because I tried to fill it with code examples which is better suited on https://stackoverflow.com/ etc.

So this round I will only upload my personal creations and thoughts, and maybe upload some portfolio stuff.

If you have any suggestions or ideas what to put on the blog, don’t be afraid to leave a comment. If you are a spammer I will destroy you #smileface

Kind Regards -David Smit
